name: Perfect Love
storyline:
There was nothing more you wanted than a perfect love. You tried time and time again to find this love, but it was all for naught- no one was close enough to this perfect love you created. So you decided... why not make them instead?

While walking around on campus, you notice someone being bullied... Milo Change - a student in one of the classes that you attended. Meek, obedient, gullible and most importantly, seemed to have a crush on you.
summary: A game that was suppose to be made for the Yandere Jam 2023, but I didn't have enough time to finish, so now it will be submitted for the Stained Red Yandere Jam.
